厞字的基本解释

厞
fèi
隐蔽；隐蔽处。

厞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fěi］
［《集韻》父沸切，去未，奉。］
［《集韻》符非切，平微，奉。］
宫室屋角隐蔽之处。

厞字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【厂字部】　厞； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页161第46
【唐韻】扶沸切【集韻】【韻會】父沸切，?肥去聲。【說文】隱也。【爾雅疏】幽隱也。【儀禮·特牲饋食】薦俎敦設于西北隅，几在南厞。【註】厞，隱也。不知神之所在，而攺饌爲幽闇，庶其饗之。又【玉篇】陋也。又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?符非切，音肥。義同。

厞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
厞字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
厞
fèi
Concealed; hidden place.
厞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fěi］
["Jiyun" father is boiling and cutting, Quwei, Feng. ]
["Ji Yun" Fu Feiqie, Ping Wei, Feng. ]
A hidden place in the corner of the palace.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Factory Word Department] 　厞; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 161 46
[Tang Yun] Help boiling cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Father boiling cut, fat go sound. [Said Wen] Hidden. [Erya Shu] You are also quiet. 【Rituals·Special Sacrifice Feeding】Recommendation is located in the northwest corner, a few in the south. [Note] Nao, hidden. I don’t know where the gods are. Also [Jade articles] ugly. Also [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Fu Feiqie, sound fat. The same meaning.
